hero.default_bio: A passionate developer who loves technology.

description: Demonstrated solid understanding of Flutter project structure and state management using BLoC architecture.
Integrated APIs and implemented a QR code scanner feature for efficient data input processing.
Utilized GitHub Projects for task management, team collaboration, assignment tracking, and progress monitoring.
Designed the User Interface (UI) for the Project Management System.
Functional Testing: Conducted UI and functional testing for AISOFT software products.
API Testing: Utilized Postman to test basic APIs and validate response data.
Database: Executed basic SQL queries to retrieve data and verify data integrity.
Collaboration: Worked closely with Developers to reproduce bugs and verify bug fixes.
Prepared course materials and instructed students under the supervision of the lecturer.
Designed practical exercises to help students gain hands-on experience with the subject matter.
Graded assignments and finalized student scores.
Architected and implemented the entire system using Clean Architecture principles on both Flutter (Client) and Golang (Server).
Mobile App (Flutter): Integrated Tuya Smart SDK to manage device provisioning, control, and real-time status updates via MQTT.
Backend (Golang): Developed high-performance microservices in Golang to handle custom business logic extending beyond Tuya's basic capabilities.
